entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
